author: mischnic
message: Remove forks to switch back to upstream crates (#80198)

files.patch:
@@ -3033,7 +3033,7 @@ dependencies = [
  "httpdate",
  "itoa",
  "pin-project-lite",
- "socket2 0.4.9",

  "tokio",
  "tower-service",
  "tracing",
@@ -4243,8 +4243,9 @@ dependencies = [
 
 [[package]]
 name = "mdxjs"
-version = "1.0.2"

 dependencies = [
  "markdown",
  "rustc-hash 2.1.1",
@@ -4580,7 +4581,7 @@ dependencies = [
  "turbopack-node",
  "turbopack-nodejs",

 ]

 ]

 [[package]]
 name = "vergen"
-version = "9.0.4"

 source = "registry+https://github.com/rust-lang/crates.io-index"
-checksum = "e0d2f179f8075b805a43a2a21728a46f0cc2921b3c58695b28fa8817e103cd9a"
